import "./viewProduct.css" import products from "../../constants/data" import BookmarkAddedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/BookmarkAdded'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export const ViewProduct = () => { const menuData = products.products; const recomended = menuData.filter((item) => item.key == "recomemded"); const momos = menuData.filter((item) => item.key == "momo"); const [active, setActive] = useState(false); return (
